subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are atop the Eastern Conference with a 14-4 record. They were expected to be competitive, but can they keep up this pace? A cast of die-hard basketball fans offer an outlook.
snippet: The Knicks are atop the Eastern Conference with a 14-4 record. They were expected to be competitive, but can they keep up this pace? A cast of die-hard basketball fans offer an outlook.
